google.name: Google
google.description: Google is a multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products.

feature.title: Search Anything, Anytime
feature.description: Access the world's information at your fingertips with Google Search.

feature.title: Stay Organized
feature.description: Keep track of your tasks, events, and appointments with Google Calendar.

feature.title: Collaborate Effortlessly
feature.description: Work together with colleagues in real-time with Google Docs, Sheets, and Slides.

gmail.name: Gmail
gmail.description: Gmail is a free email service developed by Google.

feature.title: Send and Receive Emails
feature.description: Effortlessly send and receive emails from anywhere in the world with Gmail.

feature.title: Organize Your Inbox
feature.description: Categorize and filter emails to keep your inbox organized and clutter-free.

feature.title: Stay Connected
feature.description: Sync your emails across devices to stay connected on the go.

telegram.name: Telegram
telegram.description: Telegram is a cloud-based instant messaging and voice over IP service.

feature.title: Private and Secure Messaging
feature.description: Communicate with friends and family securely with end-to-end encryption.

feature.title: Share Media Files
feature.description: Easily share photos, videos, and documents with your contacts.

feature.title: Join Communities
feature.description: Join groups and channels to connect with like-minded individuals and communities.

whatsapp.name: WhatsApp
whatsapp.description: WhatsApp is a messaging app for smartphones that allows users to send and receive text messages, voice messages, and multimedia files.

feature.title: Instant Messaging
feature.description: Send text messages, voice messages, and multimedia files instantly to friends and family.

feature.title: Voice and Video Calls
feature.description: Make voice and video calls to contacts anywhere in the world for free.

feature.title: Group Chats
feature.description: Create group chats with up to 256 participants to stay connected with multiple contacts.

tiktok.name: TikTok
tiktok.description: TikTok is a social media platform for creating, sharing, and discovering short music videos.

feature.title: Create Videos Quickly & Easily
feature.description: With our Video Generator tool, you can create high quality videos in minutes. No video production expertise is required.

feature.title: Track Performance with Pixel
feature.description: Install the TikTok tracking pixel with the click of a button. it’s so simple, no more manual installation or relying on a developer.

feature.title: Boost Online Sales
feature.description: Grow online sales by promoting your products to the audiences that are most interested in them.

twitter.name: Twitter
twitter.description: Twitter is a social media platform for creating, sharing, and discovering short posts.

features.title: Grow your reach
features.description: Advertise and sell your products directly through your Facebook page and reach billions of potential customers.

features.title: Increase your revenue
features.description: Merchants see an average increase of 15% in revenue when selling on Facebook.

features.title: Easy checkout
features.description: With Facebook Shop, your customers will be able to easily browse products on mobile and checkout on any device.

facebook.name: Facebook
facebook.description: Facebook is a social networking platform that allows users to connect with friends and family, share photos, and engage in various activities.

features.title: Grow your reach
features.description: Advertise and sell your products directly through your Facebook page and reach billions of potential customers.

features.title: Increase your revenue
features.description: Merchants see an average increase of 15% in revenue when selling on Facebook.

features.title: Easy checkout
features.description: With Facebook Shop, your customers will be able to easily browse products on mobile and checkout on any device.

mailchimp.name: Mailchimp
mailchimp.description: Mailchimp is an all-in-one marketing platform that helps businesses manage their email campaigns, build landing pages, and analyze their marketing efforts.

features.title: Grow and Measure Sales
features.description: Measure the impact of your ads, build retargeting audiences, and optimize campaigns to drive purchases with the Snap Pixel.

features.title: Showcase Your Products
features.description: Easily sync your Shopify products to your Snapchat Catalog to create engaging, made-for-commerce product ads.

features.title: Personalize Campaigns
features.description: Reach the right customers at the right time with Dynamic Ads; get set up from either Snapchat’s Ads Manager or Shopify’s Marketing tab.
